name: 斯科特·巴顿
introduction: Scott Button is a queer Vancouver-based writer and actor who works in film, TV and theatre. He's worked in the writer's room of Family Law (CW/Global, Story Department Internship) and is developing his series Same, But Different with Mezo Entertainment and his narrative podcast thriller Away with The Bridge Studios. Plays include For Now (Green Thumb Theatre), Night Passing (audio-drama, Arts Club Theatre Company) and The Hunger Room (Staircase Theatre).As an actor, Scott's onstage credits have garnered a Jessie Award nomination and includes work with ZeeZee Theatre, the Firehall Arts Centre, Delinquent Theatre, Pacific Theatre and more. Film/TV credits include Legends of Tomorrow, Supergirl, The Arrangement, When We Rise and numerous commercials. He is grateful to reside on the unceded land of the Musqueam, Squamish and Tsleil-Waututh Nations.
